answerText: bottom quark[10] The decay of the bottom quark is described in the third column of this matrix that describes the weak force.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Maryland B + Loyola  | 19 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This particle can decay into either a top quark or a charm quark via the weak interaction. For 10 points each: [10] Name this type of quark, a third generation quark with a charge of -1/3 e.
